short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for a simplified, user-friendly GitHub experience. Create, delete, duplicate, rename and move files/folders in 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to create folders, delete, move, duplicate and rename files/folders in your GitHub repositories directly from the GitHub web interface.


Features:

Create new folders directly from the GitHub web interface
Delete files and folders directly from the GitHub web interface
Move files and folders directly from the GitHub web interface
Duplicate files and folders directly from the GitHub web interface
Rename files and folders directly from the GitHub web interface
Lightweight and easy-to-use


Known issues/Bugs:
None for now.

Note: The extension is still under development, and we're working hard to address any issues in future updates.


This extension is made with love by a post-capitalism volunteer.
Learn more about some of the post-capitalism different options here:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1oZMLNDJKTnx_UAodddtirtS0MvYkA8Ge8x1NujyIABU/edit#gid=1510129948

P.S: In one of the next versions there will be an option for a paid upgraded version, and all the income will go towards the post-capitalism efforts.
